title: Refund Event Data
description: Data payload for the ecommerce.refund event. Fired when a full or partial refund is issued for a transaction.

orderId.description: The unique order or transaction identifier being refunded.

total.description: The total monetary value of the refund.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the refund (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

products.description: The list of products being refunded. Present for partial refunds to identify which items are affected.
